title: Skarner not available in shop?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: I was going through shop to find a champion to purchase when I noticed {{champion:72}} was no where to be seen. I looked through 'roles' and sorted by alphabetical and still did not see {{champion:72}}. My friends also did not see him when they tried to find him. It's not a major issue i'm just wondering if I missed something or why he is removed, or if it's just me and some others having this issue. Just want to know where my first champion I ever played went.

replies.body: If you own him, he would not show up unless you tick "show owned" (which I see you didn't in the pictures"

That means he doesn't own Sivir...

Why...

Why don't you own all the 450 champs...

Hmm... I wasn't able to reproduce this issue on either the Beta or Legacy Client. Maybe the assets for Skarner are missing from a client and [running a repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq5) may resolve this. 

Let me know if this helped!
